Blackfang came by and stroked Cam's head.

Blackfang: It's ok. You'll just have to be careful further on so as
not to be captured again. Windlord, I think Cam needs someone to train
her, don't you think? What do you think, Cam?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> wrote:
> Cam::
> She was rubbing her optics as tears streamed down her face plates. "I 
> miss Mommy and Daddy. I want mommy."  she cried harder. She looked up 
> at Windlord. "I didn't mean to be bad. Honest."  sniffles, "But I 
> wanted to go see if the other bots had another bot like me?"  
> sniffles, "I'm the only one here like me. No other bot is like me. No 
> tails, no paws, no red fur. I'm the only one."  cries, sniffles, "I 
> didn't mean to be bad."  she started to wail and cry harder.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > windlord:
> > 
> > Windlord heard the qhimper and quickly opened it an took the girl 
> in 
> > arms He sat down and said"Little one I litke to speak with 
> > you..."said serioulsy"I told you don't go far of Maximal base, 
> > right??? why did you go far then?? you was IN Predacon's territorym 
> > you FELL INSide a cage and you ALMOST was take prisioner of them... 
> > Do you know that you risked your life??? That I have to risk mine 
> in 
> > order to save you???"
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> >

> > but

> > > were complete, yet she stayed inside.  A whimpering noise could 
> be 
> > > heard from outside the chamber.
